items.content: Sound is a traveling longitudinal wave wich is an oscillation of pressure.

texts: Accoustic instruments, or any natural material for that matter, produce multiple frequencies.
Humans usually perceive the lowest frequency
Frequencies from different sources meet mid-air and combine harmonically if they are friendly with each other.
The unfriendliness of frequencies is also used, for instance, in car horns to produce piercing sounds.
